text: Hey <@UKGV272KS> - this is extremely late, because I wasn’t in this channel but was wondering if you’re still solving for this? I think I did something similar with smart content, where the base level just had no copy in the text box, and then the other versions had text for the lists. Not sure if this makes sense — feel free to PM me to work this out!

<@U03MJJ5Q4AG> We aren’t still solving for this no, ended up not being needed for the time being. The issue is the content to show would be based on a specific deal the email is being sent out for, and lists are contact-based.
Ohhh I get you! There are definitely some shortfalls in not having the equivalent of a lookup field or way to get deal info across related records. Thanks for the update!
